title: Smart Data Models - Stair schema
description: Information on a given Stair of Building (Shape, steps, stair type, etc.)

type.description: Property. It must be equal to Stair

dateObjectCreated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The registration date and time of this item as an object

dateObjectUpdated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The update date and time of this item as an object

flagDeleted.description: Property. Flag set when this item is deleted as an object

jointDirection.description: GeoProperty. Joint Direction of this item and Spatial Objects

jointSurface.description: GeoProperty. Joint Surface of this item and Spatial Objects

jointArea.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Joint Area of this item and Spatial Objects

locationBase.description: GeoProperty. Coordinates of the bottom line of this item

locationTop.description: GeoProperty. Coordinates of the top line of this item

numStep.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Steps of this item

objectName.description: Property. Name of this item as an object

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the area containing this item
Relationship. Reference to the building containing this item
Relationship. Reference to the material containing this item
Relationship. Reference to the room containing this item
Relationship. Reference to the stair containing this item

surfaceBase.description: GeoProperty. Base Shape of this item

thermalTransmission.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal transmission of this item

volumetricSpecificHeat.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Volumetric specific heat of this item
